tit.e: Momoi-toge Pass (a pass on a national route in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City)
Momoi-toge Pass (a pass on a national route in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City)

sen.j: 百井峠（ももいとうげ）は京都府京都市左京区内にある国道上の峠である。
sen.e: Momoi-toge Pass is a pass on a national highway in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Momoi-toge Pass is a pass on a national route in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Momoi-toge Pass is a pass on a national route in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

tit.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。

sen.j: 標高741mの国道477号上にある峠である。
sen.e: It is 741m above sea level and it is on National Highway 477.
It is the pass located on National Route 477 at an altitude of 741 meters.
It is the pass located on National Route 477 at an altitude of 741 meters.

sen.j: 京都市左京区内の大原百井町と鞍馬本町を隔てている。
sen.e: It forms a border between Ohara-Momoi-cho (Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City) and Kurama-honmachi (Sakyo Ward).
It separates Ohara-Momoi-cho and Kurama-honmachi in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City.
It separates Ohara-Momoi-cho and Kurama-honmachi in Sakyo Ward, Kyoto City.

sen.j: 古くから洛北の街道筋でも難所としてその名を知られており、鞍馬という名からも分かるとおり魑魅魍魎が現れる峠と伝えられる。
sen.e: Since ancient times it have been famous as a black spot of main roads of Rakuhoku (Northern Kyoto), and as the name of the neighboring area 'Kurama (a Japanese ghost)' suggests, it had been also famous as an eerie pass which various ghosts and monsters had gathered.
sen.cmt: *鞍馬'Kurama (the abbreviation for Kurama-Tengu, a Japanese ghost, characterized by its big nose, red skin, (pilgrimages') monks' clothes, and excellent martial arts)'
sen.e: Since ancient times the Pass has been known as one of chokepoints in main roads of Rakuhoku (Northern Kyoto), and as the name Kurama (a Japanese ghost) suggests, it is said to be a pass which various ghosts and monsters had gathered.

Since ancient times the Pass has been known as one of chokepoints in main roads of Rakuhoku (Northern Kyoto), and as the name Kurama (a Japanese ghost) suggests, it is said to be a pass which various ghosts and monsters had gathered.

sen.j: 現在でも難所の多い国道477号においても、百井別れと合わせて走行が難しい区間である。
sen.e: At present it is still difficult to drive as well as the famous narrow T-junction 'Momoi-wakare', some drivers might think it the worst pass among many black spots of National Highway 477.
It is one of the difficult points to drive, along with Momoi-wakare curve, in the National Route 477 which still has many chokepoints today.
It is one of the difficult points to drive, along with Momoi-wakare curve, in the National Route 477 which still has many chokepoints today.

sen.j: 車両での通行は可能であるが、峠前後は1.0から1.3車線程度の国道とは思えないほどの狭路が続く。
sen.e: Normal cars can run through it, however, unlike normal national highways, the road is only 1.0～1.3 lanes wide around the pass, so drivers have to be careful of it.
Although vehicles can run through it, the road keeps narrow as 1.0 to 1.3 lanes in width ahead and behind the pass, hard to imagine it is a national route.
Although vehicles can run through it, the road keeps narrow as 1.0 to 1.3 lanes in width ahead and behind the pass, hard to imagine it is a national route.

sen.j: 峠附近での離合は難しく、カーブなどで若干広くなった箇所を利用するほか無い。
sen.e: It is quite difficult to pass each other around the pass, drivers have to find moderate bends, which might be a little wider, for passing.
It is quite difficult to pass each other around the pass, drivers have to find moderate bends, which might be a little wider, for passing.
It is quite difficult to pass each other around the pass, drivers have to find moderate bends, which might be a little wider, for passing.

sen.j: また勾配も大変急であり、オートマ車でも1速に入れないと登るのが難しい区間もある。
sen.e: It also has pretty steep slopes, and at some sections drivers of automatic cars have to put cars into the highest gear to climb.
It also has pretty steep slopes with zones which is hard to climb for even automatic cars to shift into first gear.
It also has pretty steep slopes with zones which is hard to climb for even automatic cars to shift into first gear.

sen.j: さらに季節によっては落石があったり、落ち葉や雪が積もっていたりして、大変走行しにくい道路となっている。
sen.e: Besides, sometimes drivers have to be careful of falling rocks, heaps of fallen leaves and snow.
Besides, having rock fall, fallen leaves, and snowfall in some seasons, the road is extremely difficult to be traveled.
Besides, having rock fall, fallen leaves, and snowfall in some seasons, the road is extremely difficult to be traveled.

sen.j: 京都市内でも屈指の悪路であり、通行には細心の注意が必要な峠である。
sen.e: Note that it is really famous bad road in Kyoto City and drivers must be careful in driving.
It is one of the roughest roads in Kyoto City which is required utmost caution to be traveled.
It is one of the roughest roads in Kyoto City which is required utmost caution to be traveled.
